mapper.insert: insert into scfp_user_role values ((select id from scfp_user where uname = #{uname}) user_id, #{role_id})
mapper.update:
update scfp_user
uname = #{uname},
password = #{password},
`name` = #{name},
`identity` = #{identity},
phonenum = #{phonenum},
email = #{email},
`status` = #{status},
mapper.select: select u.id, u.uname, u.name, u.identity, u.phonenum, u.email, u.enterprise_id, u.fid, ur.role_id from scfp_user u left join scfp_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join scfp_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.uname = #{uname} and u.password = #{password} and u.status = '启用' -- and r.status = '启用'

select u.id, u.uname, u.name, u.identity, u.phonenum, u.email, u.enterprise_id, u.fid, r.id role_id, r.name roleName, e.name enterpriseName from scfp_user u left join scfp_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join scfp_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join scfp_enterprise e on u.enterprise_id = e.id where u.id = #{id}
